description:
- Minor changes to lyrics and vocals
- Separated verses 1 and 2
- Put all of the main rhythm guitar parts into one track for most situations. Also removed the different way of playing the verse riff on the guitar 1 part.
- Renamed tracks
- General corrections to the already existing guitar parts
- Added guitar parts for The Straightener. Drum and bass parts are still missing, however, the guitar parts should be mostly accurate and complete.
title: Wheels Of Confusion
